channel.title: Item death
channel.description: When ppl die on my server they still keep d claws even skulle and dont pro item,i've tried everything i can to change it but idk how to =\ ive lowered the price and everything but still..... :eek: :( :confused:

item.title: Item death
item.dc:creator: @chrissy_dee chrissy dee
item.description:
@chrissy_dee wrote:

it wasnt there =(

i tried adding

if(playerHasItem(13664)){
deleteItem(13664, 1);
}

and still nuthin =\

Read full topic

item.title: Item death
item.dc:creator: @pure_ess_ftw pure ess ftw
item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

this should work, search for public void youdied()
under that you would see something like

if(playerHasItem(6570)){ keep6570 = true; deleteItem(6570, 1);
for fire cape, just see if it is the same for your dclaws if so, try deleting keep(id) = true; post if it didnt work.

Read full topic
